scripts.clean.build: for d in packages/*; do echo $d; cd $d; yarn clean.build; cd ../..; done
scripts.clean.dependencies: rm -rf node_modules/ package-lock.json yarn.lock && for d in packages/*; do echo $d; cd $d; yarn clean.dependencies; cd ../..; done
scripts.watch: concurrently -n snap,api,client,cli,jest -c blue,green,yellow,magenta,cyan "yarn workspace @regressionproof/snapshotter watch.build.dev" "yarn workspace @regressionproof/api watch.build.dev" "yarn workspace @regressionproof/client watch.build.dev" "yarn workspace @regressionproof/cli watch.build.dev" "yarn workspace @regressionproof/jest-reporter watch.build.dev"
